item.title: These 13 tech stocks have grown profits rapidly — and they’re still on sale
item.description: Meta, Nvidia and Microsoft shares trade at discounts to their historical valuations, along with other plays in the chip and software sectors.

item.title: ‘I still have horrible memories of the Bernie Madoff scandal’: I’m 63. Who can I trust with my $655,000 401(k)?
One of Warren Buffett’s last moves as Berkshire CEO was to buy this ‘Magnificent Seven’ tech stock
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway has disclosed a stake in Google parent Alphabet that’s now worth about $5 billion.

item.title: ‘This is not a money grab’: Against our mom’s wishes, our father is leaving their estate to his church. How do we stop him?
item.description: “It is about respecting our mother’s wishes.”

item.title: Kugler’s active stock-market trades violated Fed rules. Here’s how they performed.
item.description: The stock-market trades that former Federal Reserve Gov. Adriana Kugler made while serving on the central bank’s board violated policy. At least one b...
